pullRequest.title: Get additional information on pull requests
pullRequest.body:
Also refactors getting the node id of pull requests and comments. We don't need to do paging requests, just use the old v3 REST API.
In addition, I also moved the text fixtures out of the jar file.

mergeCommit.message:
Pull request properties, refactoring

* Move fixtures, so that they aren't in the jar file.

* Refactored get-pull-request-id to use REST API (no paging)

* Refactor getting comment id, similarly.

* Bump version, document change, remove unused vars/functions
mergeCommit.messageBody:
* Move fixtures, so that they aren't in the jar file.

* Refactored get-pull-request-id to use REST API (no paging)

* Refactor getting comment id, similarly.

* Bump version, document change, remove unused vars/functions
